name: Catch My Tryst! (NSFW)
description:
A raunchy two player game where players have to catch the most toppings during a brunch time chat between a couple of ladies. We used all three themes in the narrative, with the waffle being the main object that players control. 

Disclaimer! This game has adult talk and food related innuendos.

Features:

  • Two players
  • Sexy voice over
  • Randomly falling toppings
  • PHYSICS! Tumbling glasses, bottles and cutlery
  • Velcro waffles

Creators:

@beedelma: game design, programming, art, project management

@zsuzsifer: game design, VO, narrative, project management

This game was a submission for: https://itch.io/jam/games-factory
